basic_information.scholarship_notes: These awards are often to assist due to errors on accounts or communication errors for awards. Scholarship cloned on Aug 15 2022 2:04PM

description: The award is available to student ambassadors from the UCO Tours office. Awards can be offered during the fall, spring, or summer semester. The spring and summer awards will be added as a modified award, which means you will need to re-accept your award.

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
